data.title: XfilesPro's Pricing Structure
data.meta_description: Examine the XfilesPro pricing choices to choose the ideal model for your organisation and experience efficient file management within Salesforce.
data.text:
Business pricing is basically for large-volume enterprise customers, while Standard pricing is for SMBs with a lesser number of licenses.

Yes, we do have. Please get in touch with us to know more.

Yes, the license cost is based on per user per month basis & billed annually.

No. The price doesnâ€™t include the cost of the external storage. Customers need to purchase their own preferred storage.
